EiffelStudio is the Eiffel compiler by
http://www.eiffel.com Eiffel Software . It includes not only a
30_compiler/20_command_line/00_introduction.xml command line compiler , but also a powerful IDE with several unique features, such as an
50_diagram_tool/00_introduction.xml integrated reverse engineering tool and a
60_metric_tool/00_introduction.xml quantitative code analyzer .

To get started, follow the provided
../../../general/guided_tour/studio/index.xml guided tour .

To see the new features and improvements over previous versions of the EiffelStudio environment, have a look at the
02_what_s_new/index.xml What's new section .

A quick overview of the EiffelStudio graphical interface is available
05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml here.
